mean_en: a correctional institution used to detain persons who are in the lawful custody of the government (either accused persons awaiting trial or convicted persons serving a sentence)
short_phrase: go to gaol for your crimes
sentence: The British police put many criminals in gaol on the day of the riots.
sentence_trans: 暴动那天，英国的警方抓了很多罪犯进监狱。
